website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a double-edged design, this efficient liner allows for the perfect wing application.
pros: Two-in-one design allows for easily attainable natural and dramatic looks
Wing stamp does not require dipping for mess-free use
cons: Tip is a little too thick for some users

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wish I had thought of this. A stamp for the right eye and left eye on the end of liquid eyeliner pencil with a liner on the other side of each pencil. I always mess up the wing but these are perfect! Much more subtle from the front but just what I love.
customer_reviews.author: Mona G

customer_reviews.title: Worked with my hooded eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have very hooded eyes and this works great still! Make sure you give extra time to dry though. It’s humid and 85 degrees today and I went to a party and spent time outside and sweated and this eyeliner didn’t budge! The picture is right before bed. Also I’m not a paid reviewer which I guess is a thing now? Also, I love how I can do cat eyes for the first time in my life! I’m not great at doing makeup but this made it easy! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: hklep

customer_reviews.title: GET IT! You won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I got the triple pack and I am so happy with all of them. The biggest size was not crazy or too big it was actually what I do for my day today. Using the stamp was so quick and easy I got it on my first try and I am not very coordinated at all. It is fool proof! It’s a staple in my daily routine now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carollo

customer_reviews.title: Easy, consistent, perfect wings.
customer_reviews.text: I just want to make my morning routine as easy as possible. i love winged liner but i don’t have the steady hand for it without mistakes. this makes the perfect and consistent wing every time. Love it! I ordered the 10mm (pictured) and now i’ll have to try the 12mm! Also, the first photo is after about 6 hours of wear. this second is after 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Bad for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems like a very good idea but while practicing putting it on a few times and then wiping it off, the corner of my eye felt like it was burnt. This picture is from the next day. Took about three days to completely go away. If you have sensitive skin, Then you should definitely test it somewhere other than your face first.
customer_reviews.author: B622

customer_reviews.title: Use the stamp, use another product to line the rest of your eye.
customer_reviews.text: The stamp worked fine but don’t use the pen side to line the rest of your eye, it smudges. It was tough to take off so the waterproof part is great.
customer_reviews.author: lauren kinslow

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free vegan eyeliner that works!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t ever write reviews, but I had to take a minute to let y’all know about this eyeliner! I’m not getting paid nor am I getting anything out of this. I just want to share the love ❤️ These pictures are of me just waking up this morning.... after having had this on all day yesterday and slept with my makeup on (I know, big no no). But LOOK AT IT!! I hardly have time to do my makeup anymore (because of baby) and I wanted something to make ‘life easier’. I am beyond impressed. It’s cruelty free and vegan! Not to mention it was only $13! Say WHAAAT?!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Not very user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product out. Upon receiving it, I immediately opened it. Only to be greatly disappointed. I tried to stamp the wing multiple times and I couldn't get it lined up. Then the product itself dries up shiny and vinyl like. Not very appealing, it feels like its going to crack if I open my eyes wide. I think the product needs some tweeks to be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: kisstina

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Bought 10mm. 1) Looks almost gray when put on. Even when coated over a few times, still appears gray black and not a deep black. Have to go over the wing to darken it too. 2) Tried it with and without primer. Did not stay at all. Was messed up within 1-2 hours. Completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ki-Adi Booty

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes when I use the wing part. I may just be very sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited this product, but I have not only had a hard time using it. It also burns when I use the wing part. It's weird because I have never had this issue with eyeliner. I may just be sensitive to something in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper 5

customer_reviews.title: Burns your eyelids
customer_reviews.text: Made my eyelids to burn, and caused eye tearing for hours. DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work with my eye shape.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s my eyelid shape but this product did not work for me. My eyes are no symmetrical, they are more like sisters and this product made it more difficult to achieve the cat eye look. No matter how much practice they werent even. I even tried to just use the eyeliner part but found the formula to be drying and pulling too much on my lid. Also not sure if this is a amazon thing or with the company but I ordered the petite but received the the classic which is thicker. Through the package out so I can return now. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: lmdiego

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging. Ruined clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Really love the concept and even formula. However when I went to use it the second time and I pulled the lid off, the inner ink cylinder pad fell out and ruined my white shirt and made a complete mess. Once packaging is fixed, I would try it again. It seems to be a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Schahara

customer_reviews.title: Amazon makes all things possible - even perfect winged liner.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon makes all things possible, even the perfect winged liner. I’m speechless. I’ve never been able to do winged liner in the 30 years I’ve walked the earth. This product is amazing, it’s seamless. Literally, it’s fool-proof. Not to mention it has great staying power, it’s very dark, and hasn’t smudged all day. I seriously wasn’t expecting to like it this much, you’ve got a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Makes eyes itch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wondering why my eyes have been itching so bad this past week and it’s from this thing........
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: After some practice, best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: Alright.... I really wasn’t sure about this at first... I do wish they made one that makes a thinner line, but at the end of the day, who really cares too much? After a bit of practice, it’s changed my makeup routine completely! So easy, and I feel gorgeous and done up even when I only have time for eyeliner and mascara. Advise to new users, TAKE YOUR TIME. Every time I try to hurry I mess it up. Find how it works for you and stick to it! I find that I don’t like felt tip liners, so I use my normal brush eyeliner to start it, then just match the stamped part with the line afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F

customer_reviews.title: Hands-down best eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I’ve ever had! I am the worst at trying to make winged eyeliner even on both eyes. The WORST! I tried the 10mm last time and it was just slightly too long for my taste. I got the 8mm this time and it is perfect. I’ve used it every day for a week now and haven’t messed it up once. This stuff also lasts perfectly all day. I had a funeral to attend this past weekend and I still had perfect eyeliner at the end of it despite being an emotional wreck. I hope they make this stuff forever because that’s what I plan on using. 👍😊
customer_reviews.author: Heather Weibel

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I took off a star for the stamps being slightly different, but not enough that it’s a big deal. If you are someone who struggles with ‘wings’, this is the product for you. I tried every trick to making wings there was, the tape trick, the bobby pin trick, spoon trick...etc. None of those techniques worked for me. These stamps work amazing! I finally have winged eyeliner. The eyeliner quality is excellent, so conectingn the wings with the included eyeliner pen is easy and the linger is very dramatic and pretty. This product is definitely worth the it!
customer_reviews.author: MaeMae

customer_reviews.title: Yes and yes! Worth the try
customer_reviews.text: This is my first putting on make up at the age of 33 years old!! I never wore make up in my life until recent weeks.. lately the trend is wings. They do look nice on some girls who can do it tastefully.. I struggle on doing eyeliner 1) novice in make up 2) heavy hooded eyelids 3) I have 2 different eyelids shapes double eyelid on the right and triple eyelid on my left. I have to tell u this made me a believer!! Wow!! I been practicing and felt discouraged drawing all these weird cone lopsided shapes on the corner of my eyes... these pens are great!! I even got a wing expert complimenting mine 😁✌✌👌
customer_reviews.author: CelenaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not SMUDGE PROOF and LOW QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: This PRODUCT SMUDGES and also has a STICKY FEEL within just a few hours of wear. I also use a eye primer and a setting powder with my eye make-up. I have no problem with other common drug store brands that are liquid liners. The concept of this product is great and it definitely makes a winged eye easier. This is why I at least gave 2 stars. The QUALITY OF this product is HORRIBLE, though. I wished i hadn't wasted my money. If you have HOODED EYES DON'T BOTHER, because this product will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Promotional Review — definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Definitely waterproof once it’s dry but i still can’t draw the line well above the eye. But the wings look perfect. Ill get the hang of it eventually. Note that I’m receiving additional free eyeliner for leaving this review as part of a promotion that they’re advertising on Facebook for previous customers. I paid full price for this item, however.
customer_reviews.author: missyj95

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the fat felt pen part. Just a little more tricky for me personally to get a super fine sharp line but the stamps have allowed me to throw on a perfect wing so much faster! (Which to a busy mom of 4 that's a major plus!) I use the stamps to place my wing then I go in with my NYX Epic Ink Liner to sharpen the wing and line my lid. I was really sceptical about a stamp liner but I'm thoroughly impressed with it. This is now a go-to and must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Over-hyped
customer_reviews.text: How does this product get good reviews? Stamp is huge compared to how it is shown in photos. Smudges horribly. And I need to graph my face to get both sides to be the same angle. Very disappointed. I've been hand-drawing winged eyeliner for decades and wanted to up my game. This was another waste of money. I really need to stop falling for Buzzfeed product recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: AB Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this product for a couple of different reasons. (1) It is very easy to use! No more spending 30+ minutes on trying to get semi-matching wings. With this stamp it was <10 minutes to get them on, filled in, and perfect! (2) It stayed on all day long! I was worried that the part of the wing by the edge of my eyes would smudge off throughout the day just because my eyes tend to water a lot when I wear my contacts, but they stayed perfect all day! I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who loves to wear wings!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: It does work.  I personally didn't care for it much.
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a novelty item. I think it's a decent product but for me, I found the learning curve to get the wings applied right to be way too high. I'm satisfied, but not happy, if that makes any sense. I don't blame the product, it does what it says it will do, I just don't care for it personally.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Easy quick cat eye
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy is it to get the perfect cat eye with this product.It comes with 2 eyeliner pens one for each eye and they each have 2 sides the stamp and the eyeliner.You simply stamp and then use the eyeliner side to define and perfect your cat eye.The formula is black and matte and long wearing once it’s on it stays on all day!I would recommend this product it works great and really makes it easy to get a clean symmetrical cat eye.
customer_reviews.author: M.Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Smudge proof- if I purposefully rubbed at it it smeared Water proof- I took a very wet washcloth to it and just swiped over the wings with light pressure, and it started to run some. I only wore it on a night in, and one side started to wear away. I haven't worn it out, and probly wouldn't at a pool or beach or super sweaty function. That being said, I didn't use a primer on my eye lids or face, and didn't use make up setting spray, I just went in barefaced, which tends to be a little oily. I still REALLY like it, bc it was so easy to use. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: So cute, fun, and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been good at winged eyeliner. With my hooded lids, I either make it way too big and messy, or just smudge it everywhere. These stamps make perfect, cute flicks -- no fuss, no muss! Easy to apply, just the right size, and dries quickly before I can smudge it everywhere. The liner is also so easy to use. It feels a little silly to wear makeup during a pandemic. But with a quick stamp, I can add a little something to the only feature visible above my mask, and feel special and put together. This stamp has replaced a swipe of red lipstick as my new pick-me-up.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Matelli

customer_reviews.title: Product wouldn’t come out of one side...
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited for this product because it takes me a while to make an even wing and sometimes I just get frustrated and give up. The stamp worked really well, but only on one side of my face. I tried shaking the pen and pressing it on my hand, but I could not get a full wing to print like the right side so that was disappointing. (Like it was dried up or something.) This eyeliner does smudge easily, so I let it dry with my eyes closed and then put a setting spray on top. Not great for sensitive skin either. (Some redness.)
customer_reviews.author: Moo Moo

customer_reviews.title: Great Stamp
customer_reviews.text: I resigned from doing winged eyeliner forever and then I found this. This stamp is pure gold. It makes the perfect little wing so easily! It takes a bit of learning, but once you learn, you'll be knocking out wings left and right! I had to take a star off because the actual formula of the liner isn't great. It's your typical drugstore liner. It WILL smudge. Saying that, it's super easy to remove any mistakes from the stamp. It does have a nice fine tip, so it does fine in a pinch. I definitely use another brand of liner to retrace the wing and finish lining. Say "Bye!" to free handing wings forever!
customer_reviews.author: Professional Gunsmith

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a wing for dummies
customer_reviews.text: I too was a skeptic. A no assistance wing takes me like 15 minutes and about 4 redos. The tape method, imperfect, time consuming, and also..ouch. I will say I stamped too low the first time. It's important to get the bottom of the stamp near or above your top lash line. With that said, I was stamping and connecting perfect wings by my second try. It takes me about 1-2 minutes total. I am probably going to spring for the bigger, more dramatic version soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious!
customer_reviews.text: I love thee Vogue Effects wing liner. It took a little practice for me to get it right because I'm not good at working around my eyes at all, but after a little practice, I can do it. Actually, I did my right eye perfectly the first time oh, it was my left eye that I struggled with! I had a question for the Seller, and they responded right away with a personal email, not just the typical form reply email. I really appreciate their personalized customer service, but even more than that, I really love this product! I look adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Jo

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this will be great new liner, however, there are much better ones you can buy at regular stores, ultastore, Sephora, grocery store in cosmetics, this one was barely black, not pigment rich at all, barely coming out of point, going right into creases of skin and spreading into wrinkles, sadly waste of money. I bought two packs, went straight to trash, I do not even want to use it for gym or any other non glamorous times, it is total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to get symmetry with the wings when I used eyeliner, but no more! I got the smallest wing size, and it looks great. It took a few tries to learn how to place it properly, so practice a bit when you get it. But then, you will wonder how you lived without it! I would imagine that the other sizes are similar. I had an issue with some damage that occurred in shipping, any the seller was awesome in addressing it in a quick and friendly manner. That made the purchase even better!! Great product-great seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product yesterday and have only played with it a couple times. So far, pros are that the eyeliner stays in place and makes for a quicker winged look. Even if you mess up with the stamp, you can correct it pretty easily with the liner. Love the pen applicator. Another pro is the price for what is basically two liquid eyeliner pens. Con is that it can be a little difficult to remove even with eye makeup remover. Overall, super pleased with the product and looking forward to perfecting the application. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Really Like This Liner!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the Wingliner, but so far I am very pleased. The 12mm stamp is perfect, and it is longer than others I have seen. So far I haven’t seen any smudging, and it lasts all day without fading or flaking. It goes on smooth and is full coverage. It does come off a bit in the corner if my eyes water. I have fairly bad allergies though, so they can water often. That’s hard on any eyeliner. Otherwise, it’s a great product so far, and I love that it’s cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia

customer_reviews.title: Smudges
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, probably the worst liquid eyeliner I’ve ever used. It smudges and transfers immediately even with primer. not only that, you would think since it smudges it would be easy to take off. NO, it was very hard to remove. It also made my eyes itchy. Sucky eyeliner all around.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eres

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I wanted a quicker, easier way to put on my day-to-day makeup. I gave it two stars because it is just that, quick and easy. However, while the application portion is great, the actual eyeliner formula itself is not. It is not smudge or water proof, but stays in place well if you... don’t blink too much. The pigment is not very opaque and even after a few layers it still wasn’t truly black. I’ve bought better products at Walmart for half the price. The quality isn’t even good enough for me to want to give this to my 14 year old niece. I would recommend to just save your money, and practice more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: If I can do this, anyone can!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I do not wear much makeup and any time I’d tried to do a winged eyeliner I ended up looking like a clown or a hooker and always washed it off. I saw this and decided to try it with a gift card I got for Christmas. This is my second try (first try I didn’t have the angle right), and I’m sure I’ll get better with more practice but I’m pleased with the look so far. I bought the 10mm classic and I feel like it’s a good size for me. I probably will only wear this when going out, but I’m happy to be able to get this look with relative ease.
customer_reviews.author: WV Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: *hooded eyes* review
customer_reviews.text: I have hooded eyes and anyone that also has them knows that it is truly a struggle to do winged eyeliner. I wasn’t sure if I’d be able to use the stamp on my eye shape at all. It did work, but it definitely needed some adjustments and filling in. It does take some practice so I would suggest trying it at home before you actually have to wear it outside the house. Overall, I’d say it was worth it. Cons: the regular tip eyeliner (not the stamp) is terrible. It’s patchy and opaque. I used a different eyeliner to finish my eye and fill in the stamp. Also, it’s definitely not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and at first she was skeptical of how helpful it would be but after playing with it for an hour, she was sold! She really likes the ease of having a perfect “eye” but the product doesn’t last all day so she covers the design with a different liquid liner and it works well. As a mom, I like that it looks “understated” and doesn’t overpower her eyes. This product eliminates the frustration one feels when trying to get both eyes looking the same and also gives her a confidence boost knowing she did it herself and it didn’t take 20 minutes. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roopod

customer_reviews.title: EASY to Use
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to use. I suck at makeup but I love cat-eye if I ever do wear makeup. So this is perfect for me. It takes a bit to make sure the stamps are lined right but they are crazy easy to use and I'd recommend them to anyone who has issues and needs a fast cat-eye. I love them. They last long. I did have a smudge problem the first two times I used them but since then I haven't so I must have done something wrong originally. But I totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tayhlia

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product- I was expecting them to be cheap but these really work well! I have visual problems and I used these perfect first time! Second time I thought would be super easy and was not paying attention and got one crooked. Just takes seconds to line up so the following uses worked well. I ordered for you 23 year old daughter who can free line her liner well but she loved them too! I sleep in it and wear the next day, especially if I’m not going anywhere special - very durable!
customer_reviews.author: T. Heik

customer_reviews.title: Time saver! Frustration reducer!
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner is the part I dreaded the most when doing my make up! I have ruined my eye makeup so many times trying to get a semi-good cat eye! And now, with these stamps is so easy and it saves so much time!!! Also, when I don't feel like doing a full face of make up(which is most of the time lol) I just use the stamps to do my eye liner, apply some mascara, lip gloss... less than 5 minutes and it looks like I actually tried! I love this and I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: So easy and works well
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I did not get this sooner. I wish though that they would make just one of the pens in the pack with the right and left wing and the other pen the liner pen. Something to think about makers of this product just sayin. Otherwise, smudge resistance is 100% true. Just let it dry completely without touching during the process. Water resistant 80 % true. Longevity is about all day for work . I have yet to go out for a night of dancing hard so to that I can’t say how it does for humidity and sweat .
customer_reviews.author: AniAaron2321

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I had serious doubts about this thing, but I have always wanted to try winged liner and I SUCK at doing it myself. The wings never line up, or the angle is all wrong and it looks stupid. I have watched tons of YouTube video, but the skill continues to elude me. But this stamp? OMG, it's frickin' easy and it worked the very first time. Even I can have winged liner now and it only takes a second. I love, love, love this product and will buy it again when the liner runs out.
customer_reviews.author: KFloyd

customer_reviews.title: mmmNO!
customer_reviews.text: Day1: Just got this today. It was looking really nice for the 1st hr after application. After that... all downhill. Day 2: gave it another try. This time with all the eye prep necessary to ensure long wear. Well... the eyeliner was completely gone by mid-day. RETURNING.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Not dark enough, sort of blotchy- but still Ok
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this product is very intriguing. I've always had a problem making my wings symmetrical. So when I heard of this, I was realy excited. My only issues are two things; The color isn't as dark as it should be, it's like a dark smokey and splotchy gray.. and again, it's blotchy and even if you color in with the other side of the pen, it remains blotchy. It's not a complete deterrent, it isn't horribly noticeable by others, but as a consumer.. you'll notice it
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF THESE REVIEWS ARE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Paste this URL into Fakespot. I wish I had before buying - as of today it's rated D as far as legitimacy of reviews. This is not really useable. The mark it makes is not even close to black and the lines are hazy and blurry. This will give you a fuzzy, dark grey cat eye that smudges onto the rest of your eyelid immediately. It reminds me of when I was a kid and used washable markers as eyeliner. Normal eyeliner is easier to get good results with than this.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Wore mine 2 days in a row with slight touch up..GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: This product gives you a good base to start at while applying wings evenly. Now it is also smudge proof. This is very very true. Once you get it on.... if you do not like it and want to redo/re-apply the product.. Then have make up remover wipes ready. Or do like I do, use baby wipes. They work just as well, AND they are cheaper for more wipes. Also I was able to wear this over night and only had to touch up one wing the next morning. I always do this test with eyeliner. This product passed!
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in yesterday and tested it out when I got home from work after working in the stupid Texas heat all day. I couldn't resist the temptation of trying it out as soon as I opened the box, and I'm so impressed! It comes with 2 sticks since the stamp is angled differently for each eye. I haven't put on eyeliner in months, and usually when I put it on it takes me a while to get back into knowing how to apply it properly. Perfect cat eye in under two minutes, no exaggeration. I immediately ordered it again to give to my sister. 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, the wing is on point!!! I guess some would say that when water touches it, and it comes right off that could be a good thing (if you’re washing your face) but, I want a long lasting liner despite a little wetness! It didn’t seem to have any fallout but I wasn’t sweating or anything, so I’ll have to test the theory in the spring/ summer. The pen part was a little difficult to apply because the tip is rather large, all in all it’s a pretty good product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Scala

customer_reviews.title: The Holy Grail of tools with superior longwear results...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! I so envied the girls who can form the winter liner free hand because I never could. This is the Holy Grail of tools I've added to my make-up arsenal! I have extremely oily skin that's the main ingredient in my youthful looks but hard on products. The shipping was prior to the estimated delivery date and was neatly packaged when it arrived. On a hot, humid Midwest day, the product wore like I'd just applied it for more than 7 hours from the time of application! I'm definitely going to purchase this as my future fav from now on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer for me! The stamps give a great starter wing, and the pen side makes it super simple to finish out the wing to the length and sharpness I like. I have always struggled with symmetry, and the stamps have solved that problem for me. This eyeliner is also so long lasting (worn with my Urban Decay eyeshadow primer). I've worn it to a rock concert in July heat and I've worn it to sleep at night with my face in the pillow. It doesn't even smudge a little bit! I am curious to see how long before the pens and stamps dry out, but so far I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this eyeliner! The stamps take a little practice but are fairly easy to use. I have deep-set and hooded eyes, so it took a few tries to figure out the best way to angle the stamp for my eye shape. Once I got that down, using the stamps became a breeze. The liner lasts all day and doesn't budge or smudge. I bought this on a whim after seeing it in a Buzzfeed article and I am so glad that I did. It's made my makeup routine significantly easier and faster. It's definitely comparable to other, more expensive, brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions and saturation point
customer_reviews.text: So, I don't know if it's just mine, but it's hard to know where to point the stamp, like more up? Down? On the eye line or beside it? Also, the stamp doesn't make a full, clean mark unless you do a couple tests on wet cloth before. And it fades off in pieces as the day progresses, so when you get home you have parts of the liner missing.
customer_reviews.author: Zoubi

customer_reviews.title: This is fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is great! If you're not the best at doing your makeup, specifically eyeliner, then this is for you. It's a double-sided pen with the stamp on one end and the point on the other. So you can use the stamp if you're in a rush or the pen if you're more practiced and want more of a custom look. It's really well packaged and comes with two eyeliner pens so it's a great deal and an overall great product. Try it and add it to your makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Elves

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYELINER EVER
customer_reviews.text: So I love this eyeliner for 2 reasons: 1. For those of us who cannot freehand a cat eye it’s a perfect tool to get the look you want. The stamp doesn’t smudge or run and looks great! 2. The eyeliner itself is flawless. I wore it all day for a test run and spent 80% of the day outside in the humidity and even though my eye shadow was running down my face, this liner stayed put. All of my other eye liners told me they now feel inferior and are going to leave me. This is the best beauty purchase I’ve made in a while and will for sure be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: N2012

customer_reviews.title: It is a great pen, but the stamp is not consistent
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this and first try it worked great but the problem is that it's not consistent, the stamp is not solid, meaning you need to be prepared to try it a few time's to get a solid wing stamp that is all black and not with gaps. I don't think the quality is great, so I will be returning it, it didn't give me the flawless wing I was looking for. I ordered instead the Kaja wing stamp pen and liner and that product is really amazing, more expensive, but I guess you pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Puja Venkataraman

customer_reviews.title: Just makes giant smudges
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work since I wear cat eyes regularly but would do so more if the amount of effort required was reduced. I tried this product in two separate sizes and was unable to make it work in a way that didn't just cause massive smudges. Sharp lines are impossible. It also seems to affect the crispness of other liquid liner, if you try to use this as a guide and then manually go over it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Skipp

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast & easy to apply!!! Loved that they were labeled left & right! Wore it all day & it lasted the only thing is I haven’t tried to see if it is waterproof. The only thing not so great about it is it does smudge. I have a baby so I get hit in the face a lot during the day. So it smudged. Other than that I will continue to buy this item cause it’s super simple & great for day to day when I apply makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Arnoult

customer_reviews.title: I know what my sister is getting for Christmas...
customer_reviews.text: I am that girl that never touched make up until college and still doesn't know how to do what all the girls on youtube are doing... no matter how many tutorials I watch I can't seem to shapeshift like they can... but this stamp... IT WORKED!? I honestly didn't have very high hopes, but yet, on the very FIRST try I look like i've been winging eyeliner my whole life! Okay, so it may not be flawless, but it's 98% better than I can do myself and for the ease of use, I'm sold for life.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and experts alike
customer_reviews.text: I’m practiced at wing eyeliner but this product just makes it so much faster and easier...I stamp both sides and then build my wing around the stamps with the non stamp side of the eyeliner. Speaking of I would buy this eyeliner even if it didn’t have the stamp - it’s firm and super easy to use, doesn’t feather and stays in place and is long wearing and smudgeproof. Wish I had bought this sooner it seriously cut the time and effort I use doing eyeliner by a significant amount. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: r2

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great!!! Quick and easy! I stamped it on my hand a few times to get an idea of how hard to press and if it was smudge Proof. It didn’t budge! It’s longevity was all day in the hot Texas sun! At the end of the day I had to really work it with my make up remover and it seems to not come off , but a wash cloth gently removed it after the make-up remover “softened” it. Would recommend to anyone that wants a quick everyday liner!
customer_reviews.author: AllieKirk

customer_reviews.title: Stays on really well and great help with symmetry
customer_reviews.text: In general, it was really nice to have a guide to help me with symmetry. It stamped on very well. Filling it in with the pen side took a bit more practice. Smudge proof, yes it really is although messups did come off fairly easily with a qtip and a little makeup remover.. Longevity, I feel asleep very tired and didn't take my makeup off (I know, it's a no no) next day looked in the mirror and it is still perfect. Debated if I could keep it on for the day, but to hard to touch up my other makeup around it. All in all great product and will buy again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly its a really lovely product. It does deliver beautiful wings and stays for a while without smudging, with that being said, two things are less than perfect. First, if your eyelid is wrinkled, uneven, or you are an older person it is difficult to stamp it to make both eyes look the same; second, two physical liners are little too much to carry around if you want to travel with it. I wish they would make a version with just one-liner with both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: Makeup routine game changer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried for years to wear winged eyeliner, watching countless hours of YouTube tutorials, but I cannot seem to make it even or the right shape. This product actually works and is so easy to use. The only thing I had an issue with is the "ink" (for lack of a better term) not transferring to the thin end of the wing. I found that taking the liner side of the pen and coating the stamp with it before applying takes care of this. I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone who struggles with winged eyeliner or those who want to speed up their makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Yassss!!!!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is one for each side! I wasn’t expecting it! It helps so much! The lines are clean, I did show a small smudge from after applying. Honestly after you let it dry, if you have primer on, it won’t come off. I tried water and I had to rub a little bit after it dried for literally one second. Came off easily with a textured make up wipe but didn’t move when I wiped it with my finger after completely drying. Easy to make them as wide or thin as possible. I tried to show wide and thin lines. Definitely recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Good plan, bad execution
customer_reviews.text: The idea is solid, but the liner was not good. Wiped off no matter how long it had been there, wore off even faster.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Overall extreamly effective
customer_reviews.text: Its a really good black, it applies easily and the stamp makes things a lot faster. The hardest part is getting both stamps applied at the same angle. It smudges a little bit but not bad enough for me to personally care too much, the tip was the part i was rally looking for because i wanted something that could be applied in a really thin line or a thicker line and im able to do both with this, i have rather hooded eyes so that might be why it smudges a little bit but it stays on pretty well for a really long time as far as i could tell
customer_reviews.author: 1999 still a 90s child

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: Okay, normally I'm not a "this product will change your life" person, especially not when it comes to makeup, but holy crap, this product will change your life. I cannot draw a wing to save my life, especially because I've got some mild arthritis in my hands, and with this, people are constantly commenting on how good my eyeliner looks, asking what my secret is. I promise, if I can make it work, anyone can. Seriously, it's as good as it says.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Harder than they make it look but still easier than freehand.
customer_reviews.text: So the pics are day 1 right after doing it and the end of day. I don't wear makeup daily. I didn't place the wings well the first time. I did much better the second but haven't taken more pics. My new eyeshadow was definitely creasing and wearing off but the eyeliner stayed pretty well all day. They do seem a bit dry at times but I don't take both caps off at the same time anymore like the lady in the video did since I'm slow and this seems to help with that. I used the 12 vintage here. Love them! Will buy again. Already recommended to a friend who's said she's getting some too.
customer_reviews.author: Katastrophe

customer_reviews.title: Unskilled makeup applicators rejoice
customer_reviews.text: I love a good winged eyeliner but I’ve always struggled with getting them even, then adding a little more to each side & then having to take your makeup off & start all over! These little stamps are perfect, it’s 2 pens one for the right eye and one for the left, it’s dual sided, each side has a stamp & a touch up pen, the eyeliner is good, it stays on, & doesn’t smudge. I’m honestly upset I didn’t come up with this idea first but I’m happy someone did. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Zka

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have very hooded (mature) eyes and wings have always been a challenge due to creases. First time out of the box and I got a perfect wing on my right side. I wore this to an occasion where I shed a few happy tears and believe it or not, my wings remained intact. I meant to take a pic before I took my make up off b/c I couldn't believe they were still there. Believe me I've tried very trick in the book before buying these stamps (liquid liner set w/powder, waterproof pencil liner, heating the eyeliner, etc...). The results with the stamps were superior. I hope more colors become available!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use Hello Cat Eyes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time and my eyes totally looked lifted. I have been trying to draw wings with my eyeliner in the past with no success. This is so easy to use. I liked the results too. Will definitely use this when I go out on special occasions and every day wear for a bold eye look. Please offer a make up corrector pen with this kit. It would help immensely with eyeliner mistakes. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R. Carrier

customer_reviews.title: The wording on the pens kinda erase after a while
customer_reviews.text: I got the biggest size and my eyes are huge so it worked for me. I wish they would engrave “left” and “right” on the eyeliners because the letters starting fading after a week of use and I use this when i’m in a hurry and i have to always have to try them on my hand first to figure out which is which. But I labeled them so I guess it’s good enough just looks ratchet haha
customer_reviews.author: Pratik

customer_reviews.title: Fool-proof cat eyes!
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm! The stamp is perfect! It shapes very nicely, dries pretty quickly, and doesn't smudge nearly as easily as when I try to do winged tips myself. I go over them with some super smudge-proof Kat Von D eyeliner since my eyes tend to water pretty quick. I'm terrible at doing cat eyes so these get an A+ from me! Full disclosure, the pens I got don't look the same as what's pictured. The box has the branding but the pens are totally unmarked. They still work just great though so I'm not complaining!
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Invention I'm Glad to have Found!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Just stamp, and draw your eyeliner to meet the start of the wing. The eyeliner is nice and black, not too shiny, very smooth and doesn't skid over eyelid. It's definitely long lasting, I have to use eye makeup remover to remove. I've found that angling the stamp lower, more horizontally so it starts at the outer corner of my eyes works perfect every time (I have large round eyes).
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for cheer makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help me do my daughters makeup for cheer. She is only 7 and does competition cheer. They have the girls do a smokey eye with winged liner. I have no problem doing eye liner on myself but on an anxious 7 year old this stamp makes it a breeze. I recommended it to all of the cheer moms as she received so many compliments on her makeup. It is really that easy to use!! If we ever lose one or it runs out we will be purchasing this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: courtney carter

customer_reviews.title: Seriously foolproof
customer_reviews.text: I'm a spaz and have never been able to make a decent wing. Never, and I've tried over and over. Then along comes this stamp, 3 minutes after opening it up I have perfectly winged liner on both sides. Nice black, rich color - not dull or grey. I was so amazed that I ran to my computer to write this review. I can't attest to longevity, smudging or water-resistance but will update my review once I can. Definitely recommend as of now!
customer_reviews.author: noellejd

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I anticipated this to be good from the reviews I read. However, I was not prepared for how fantastic it was right out of the box! I am a woman who CANNOT do eyeliner at all! My first try with the product and it went on perfectly! I nearly cried as this has never happened before! And it lasts! For the price? It blows me away they don't charge more. There are two applicators - one for the right eye and one for the left eye. It is dummy-proof. Rarely do us women get what we paid for and it then exceeds are expectations. Thank you so much for this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: CindyTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I am horrible at doing a wing linger on my small eyes and these help; especially trying to get a wing on my left eye. It has a stamp on one end and other end is a liquid liner, comes with one for each eye. They have held up after a year. Make sure to let dry before you blink as it’s does run on the more liquid side. Really convenient. A must have for anyone that can’t free hand like me.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this stamp on eyeliner! Most of the pictures in reviews look like they are makeup artists but I will promise you I am nothing close to that. I got this because I’m always running late to work and never have time to put on any makeup. My first time trying it took me about 60 seconds to do both eyes. It is so easy! I also love that the other side is a liner pen (which I was skeptical about) but it goes on so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: BB423

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner for Cat eye or eyeliner effects
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product. I usually take 15 mins to do my eyeliner perfectly for my dance recitals which include cleaning and re-doing multiple times. But with this eyeliner, I took only 5 mins to do it in a single go. It lasted really long even in burning hot weather. It looked so beautiful even from a long distance. I also did the eyes for my dance friends very easily. I loved the product. Must have for all those who love eye makeup and a must have for all the dancers who need eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: rasu

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked at how well this worked! I saw this product on Buzzfeed and thought I'd try it, not expecting it to work. However, it's amazing! I've never been able to do winged eyeliner before, I also messed it up somehow. This makes it 100x easier and they match almost every time. The only hard part is making sure you angle it correctly for each side. They eyeliner also lasts a long time. I definitely recommend this for anyone who's bad at putting on eyeline like me!
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is EVERYTHING. I have never been able to get even, matching lines. These liners are a game-changer. I have frequent panic attacks and happened to have one while wearing eyeliner. Normally, that would mean having to wash running liner off my face once I calmed down but when I tell you in spite of crying for at least a half hour the liner hadn't moved - believe me, I was amazed. The rest of my makeup was a mess but the liner was PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna D.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, but not always a sharp wing point
customer_reviews.text: When they say long lasting, they mean it!! It lasted through a shower, workout, and didn’t smudge or flake all through the night. It’s also really easy to use. The only issue is that the stamp doesn’t always stamp the point at the end of the wing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best.  Product.  Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you are crunched for time in the mornings and a eyeliner wrecker like myself!!! I have been able to get one eye perfect but the other always used to be wonky, but not anymore! Perfect wings every time and it stays on!!! I work in a medical field and it stays through my day, yet comes off with a makeup wipe at the end of the day. I’m so happy to have found this product that I want to try the 8mm next. I bought the classic and LOVE the way I look!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Make up amateur? Then THIS is the eyeliner for you!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave about this product enough!! I’m a make up amateur and just can’t seem to do my eyeliner! This product has changed the way I do my make up entirely- now I feel like I can rock a more dramatic look because these stamps put on my wings perfectly each time. I find this product so easy to use and to get it right on the first try. I ordered the 10mm stamp and for me, I think I should’ve started with the 8mm stamp but it still looks great! The stamp and the eyeliner pen puts on product that lasts all day without cracking or flaking, yet it comes off easily with make up remover.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I would give 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: They say you should never ever ask a girl with winged eyeliner why she's late. I, like most ladies out there, STRUGGLE to get a matching wing on both of my eyes. One always looks stellar while the other looks cockeyed or smeary. The Wingliner fixed that problem and I LOVE IT!! I've used it daily since purchasing, it's been such a time saver. I love that it's waterproof, it stays on effortlessley throughout the day and even into my evening workout. Will most certainly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Seriously obsessed 🤩
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AH-MAZING! After countless YouTube tutorials on how to create the perfect wing I was pretty much over the inconsistency of both sides and ended up looking like a raccoon. I thought I would try this because why not, and I am so glad I did! The stamps are so easy to use and now both my eyes match! What took me so much time in the morning (I usually ending up wiping it off) now takes me 5 minutes and looks great! My only thing is the actual felt tip doesn’t glide easy on my eyelid but I just use my other liner for that. Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtg

customer_reviews.title: Love! Definitely get it
customer_reviews.text: Omg I loved this! I was hesitant to try since I am faithful to my NYX matte liquid liner but the stamp is so perfect and easy to use that it saved me so much time! To be honest I didn’t really use the other end of the pencil that has the regular liner because I like a brush tip end for liquid liner and it’s not but I used the stamp which I loved, wasn’t to wingy/pointy just the perfect angle. One thing I wish is that they had the stamp in different style wing tips
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised that it actually worked. It applies instantly and evenly. I wore it on my naked skin, no primer or other makeup, and it lasted all day. It got a little smudgy if I touched it but it never flaked off or faded. I will add, it says two pack but one is for your right eye and one is for your left eye. Both pens have a regular liner side on it as well. So you get two pointy liners and one right wing and one left wing. Anyways, It works well and I'm glad that I got it. Certainly worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ott

customer_reviews.title: Not for me and I'm sad
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted that little wing for about 50 years. This product gave me my dream but the liner dried so hard that it broke as my eyes moved around. It came off in flakes. Then when I went to take off my mascara (warm water and a wash rag) it smeared little black dots all over my face. I loved my little wings, for about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find it as easy as what was depicted in the video or what other reviewers were saying. Had to practice with the stamps several times and my eyes started to get irritated. The right stamp doesn’t work, I don’t get the winged affect. I ended up using the left stamp on my right eye. I will be reaching out to seller on this. The eye liner is nice and I found that easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dee F

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, long lasting, beautiful results
customer_reviews.text: These stamps have been an absolute dream to use! The formula is beautiful and not patchy, it lasts a long time, and just looks amazing overal! These stamps have been the absolute miracle for the makeup look I’ve always wanted but have been unable to achieve; my hand drawn wings always look crooked and weird! I bought the full set, and am wearing the small wing in this photo. The real learning curve of this product is just positioning the stamp itself, and drawing the connecting line which was pretty easy to master overall. I can’t recommend these stamps enough and I got compliments daily on my wings!
customer_reviews.author: LovelyStitchesCrochet

customer_reviews.title: Honey you better get these...
customer_reviews.text: If your thinking about buying these do yourself a favor and get them ASAP. I've seen reviews on youtube of products like these that are smudgey garbage...that's not this product at all! I took a shower, worked out and yelled at my kids and still looked fabulous. I have an eye disorder that prevents me from seeing properly to do wings on one side, and these little tools completely eliminates that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Raeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for novice
customer_reviews.text: I had been having trouble with getting the winged look right for my eyes. This is perfect for me! I got the 10mm one. I can angle it so I either have a long wing or a short one and I can also change the angle a bit too (eg. I can have the wing be a little more tilted or straighter across) Very versatile with different winged looks. It stays on pretty well but I have found that the part where I line the rest of my eyes can get rubbed off easily by the end of the day. The winged part usually lasts until I take it off. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: pntxwl7

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use even for a 52yr old who's never put wings on her eyes. Even though I got this a week ago I'm just starting to play with it. It seems pretty easy. I've never put wings on. I've always just online my eyes. I like how it looks with my false lashes on. We'll see if it's long lasting. My mom is dying so lots of tears are being she'd. I'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: These stamps actually work and make a nice cat eye. The formula is long-lasting. The only downfalls I found were that the lettering on the liner fades quickly, so it’s hard to identify which liner is for which eye unless you remove the top. Also, I bought the longest wing and didn’t take the lid off straight and tore one of the stamps. Luckily, I didn’t tear it all the way through so it still works if I’m gentle with it. Be careful taking the cap off! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

product_meta.title: Winged Eyeliner Stamp – The Flick Stick by Lovoir, Waterproof Make Up, Smudgeproof, Long Lasting Liquid Eye liner Pen, Vamp Style Wing, 2 Wingliner Pens (10mm Classic, Midnight Black)
